name: phpeggy
description: PHP target for Peggy parser generator

scripts.php:all: npm run php:csfix && npm run php:static && npm run php:test
scripts.php:all-manual: npm run php:csfix-manual && npm run php:static-manual && npm run php:test
scripts.php:lint: npm run php:csfix && npm run php:static
scripts.php:lint-manual: npm run php:csfix-manual && npm run php:static-manual
scripts.php:static:
for f in test/fixtures/*.php; do echo "
Processing $f ...
PHPStan:"; ./vendor/bin/phpstan analyse -c phpstan.neon --no-progress $f; echo "Psalm:" ; ./vendor/bin/psalm $f; done
scripts.php:static-manual:
for f in manual-test/output/*.php; do echo "
Processing $f ...
PHPStan:"; ./vendor/bin/phpstan analyse -c phpstan.neon --no-progress $f; echo "Psalm:" ; ./vendor/bin/psalm $f; done
